notesStmt.note: The first folio of a tractate Middot, under the heading מסכת מדות. Contains chapter I up to Mishnah 3 ויציאה; the writing ends here, in mid-sentence, as the verso is blank; The stretching of the last word indicates that this interruption may have been intentional, thus this copy may be ephemeral; Erroneous orthography and vocalization.
Condition: incomplete; damaged, losses in upper exterior corner; verso is blank.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
